author: jsoref
body:

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@jsoref**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body:
LGTM

My $0.02 on the one-sentence-per-line issue: If someone wants to go through the MDs and fix it, that would be a welcome contribution. If you do so, please submit it as an isolated PR that contains only the line changes and nothing else. That will make it easier to review and accept.

title: spelling fixes: docs
